contact.name: MahmoudReza Rostami
contact.intro: My name is MahmoudReza,Experienced Full Stack Java Developer with 12 years in the industry and high-level proficiency in the following programs: Java, Javascript, SQL and ES6, expertise with HTML ,Reactjs and CSS seeks to establish a career as the Full Stack Developer for Renaissance Tech Developers. I am very familiar and experienced with Web Application Architecture and have worked with a good number of successful development teams.

work.description: Maintaining and developing new features for online banking.Online Banking enables bank customers to conduct a range of financial transactions and offers various features such as viewing account balances, obtaining statements, checking recent transaction and making payments.The scope of the project is large-scale with 4 M active customers and about 15,000 concurrent users.
developing new features for online trading.online trading enables  customers to meet user needs, asset management, sales orders, system customization and management operations.
Developed and customized applications based on new requirements.

Develop and configure in the Compiere framwork.Compiere ERP+CRM is the leading open source ERP solution for Distribution, Retail, Manufacturing and Service industries.Create web version of Compiere from based GWT and Ext GWT
Developed and customized applications based on new requirements.

education.description: Bachelor Of Information Technology in Application Programming. Graduated with Distinction.

My main task in this project is design, development and support all phases of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) of project.
